roadmap

commits.message:
chore/147/optimize bundle (#164)

* chore: add dayjs library

- will be used in place of luxon for date parsing and validation.

* chore: remove luxon library from source

- replaced with dayjs

* chore: remove luxon from codebase

* remove local-forage from codebase

- replaced with just local-storage.

* chore: remove localforage dep

* chore: remove default graph.json bundle

- this isn't used

issue.title: [Chore] Optimize production bundle
issue.body:
**What needs to be done**
- [x] Migrate from luxon to dayjs
  - dayjs is very small, should cut down on initial bundle size. See: https://day.js.org/
- [ ] Migrate from localForage to direct local-storage.
- [ ] Look into migrating away from styled-components to plain css, as styled components aren't used.

pull_request.title: chore/147/optimize bundle
pull_request.body:
**What changes did you make? (Give an overview)**

- chore: add dayjs library
- chore: remove luxon library from source
- chore: remove luxon from codebase
- remove local-forage from codebase
- chore: remove localforage dep
- chore: remove default graph.json bundle

 

**Which issue (if any) does this pull request address?**

Closes #147

commits.message:
fix: attempt scroll fix on mobile

Related #150

issue.title: [Enhancement] Fix sentry deployment git ref
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**

It seems like sentry includes all commits from previous deployments, this might be configurable?

issue.title: [Enhancement] Add more e2e tests, update pipeline to support local build
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
With the merge of #87, the production build is tested and tests the main page, and main nav, but nothing else. 

More tests should be added.

issue.title: [Enhancement]  Look into using Playwright rather than cypress
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**

Might be able to leverage:
https://github.com/marksandspencer/nx-plugins/tree/main/packages/nx-playwright

commits.message:
feat/87/playwright (#159)

* chore: add playwright deps

* chore: add playwrite generated files

- need to add some sensible tests, and set up the overall codebase for
tests.

* feat: add index tests

- test basic functionality tied to the index page that shouldn't change.

* feat: add app-header-bar tests

* chore: start adding pipeline

- need to stop however, as the test script doesn't currently work
correctly. Will need to write a custom CI script to execute the e2e
tests locally.

- will update the pipeline with a check against production instead.

* chore: add production deployment flow

commits.message:
chore: start adding pipeline

- need to stop however, as the test script doesn't currently work
correctly. Will need to write a custom CI script to execute the e2e
tests locally.

- will update the pipeline with a check against production instead.

feat: add index tests

- test basic functionality tied to the index page that shouldn't change.

issue.title: [Feature] Add system theme toggle
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
There are currently 2 themes, but we should have a third one that is based on the system's theme.

See nx-template for specifics.

issue.title: [Chore] Optimize production bundle
issue.body:
**What needs to be done**
- [ ] Migrate from luxon to dayjs
  - dayjs is very small, should cut down on initial bundle size. See: https://day.js.org/
- [ ] Migrate from localForage to direct local-storage.
- [ ] Look into migrating away from styled-components to plain css, as styled components aren't used.

comment.body: Was going to do this, but I think adding basic e2e tests will help stabilize everything first.
